QuestData.Title: Plainstrider Menace
QuestData.Description: Are you familiar with plainstriders? Useless animals. Can't fly. Gamey. Brain the size of my knuckle. Too dim to get out of the way of a moving cart. I've broken more axles thanks to their thick skulls... Sometimes I think the quilboar intentionally frighten flocks of them into the path of our caravans just prior to an ambush.$B$BMake me proud, $c. Cut a swath through those filthy birds to keep the roads free, and bring me their beaks as proof.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the plainstrider beaks?
QuestData.RewardText: Very good, $n. That's one less thing to worry about on the road.
